name: Innertrends Ltd
description: Developer of a data analytics platform designed to improve the onboarding experience for new users. The company's platform uses machine learning and data science algorithms to expose behavioral patterns in SaaS products, enabling companies to engage and retain customers improve user acquisition, and increase revenues.
